attributes.action: stop the state stealing our babies
attributes.additional_details: The state need to stop taking babies without good reason. This has been going on for years recently there being a really bad case where the state has taken a babie only one day old, very heartlessly and cold with no thought or consideration for the parents of the child and as far I as can see without any reason what so ever. you yourself can see by watching the video on you tube Title STAFFORDSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL STEAL ONE DAY OLD BABY. There has to be proper guide lines regarding this really bad issue. SOME THINK NEED TO BE DONE ABOUT THIS MATTER WITH  ONE DAY OLD BABY JACK WHO SHOULD BE WITH HIS PARENTS NOT IN CARE
